channel.title: [508] How can I change weapon special damage?
channel.description: If I want the weapon special to hit better What do I need to seach in? Thankz :D!

item.title: [508] How can I change weapon special damage?
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

pkpure stop posting… you cant even code, stop saying sht about i yaa i he’s a pro coder ur nothing u can’t do crap all. you asked people to help you with server cause u cant make commands even a global object or i bet you cant even move a npc or add a new shop (not editing a shop to be different) adding a new one with wanneshop stop acting pro i bet you cant even help this person who needs help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 08:48:08 pm[/size][hr][quote=“xxpkpurexx, post:14, topic:307709”]well thats y the stats r for spec… watch make it like 1000 hit rate and then try a spec watch it hit more with a spec…[/quote]

pure… are you dumb thats for bonuses the specs are in the client.java but sorry f0r_th3_l0se for going off topic i code 317s not 508s btw but umm this pk kid dont trust him seriously he cant make commands if see his post for people to help make his server, but i can maybe idk if its same as 317 for this but just to “try” to stay ontopic. maybe search ur client.java or whatever u main file is, the id of the item and it will well, on 317s it shows like 3.14 for hitdiff and yea same as what I yaa I said pretty much. and im sorry im pissed at pkpure. he’s posting in everyones topics he doesent even know how to code at all he just wants to get posts.

item.title: [508] How can I change weapon special damage?
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

kk go to config find wepons put a wepon type then change max spec hit. ok?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 07:43:47 pm[/size][hr]1) open youre ‘‘source’’ and go to ‘‘config’’.
2) once in ‘‘config’’ find ‘‘item’’.
3) find there the weapon/armour you want to fuck up…
4) found it?.. good there are suposed to be 12 numbers behind youre weapon/armour.
5)change them all up to 999999 for max.
6)youre sucsessfully done:] restart youre source and tadaa!
